entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local drifting snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Occasional local drifting snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
